items.title: Stock market winners and losers on Trump’s second day in office
items.description: Overall, markets rose, as Trump eased investors’ fears about his line on tariffs.

items.title: TikTok is safe for now, but X and Bluesky are launching similar-looking vertical video feeds to take its place should the ban hammer come down again
items.description: Instagram, meanwhile, is working on a CapCut clone.

items.title: Elon Musk’s X and Bluesky look to cash in on TikTok uncertainties with new video features
items.description: X and Bluesky have announced they are launching custom video feeds as TikTok faces an uncertain future in the U.S.

items.title: Vivek Ramaswamy’s departure as DOGE co-czar removes growing political liability for Elon Musk
items.description: The added controversy around Ramaswamy is the last thing Elon Musk needs as he races to cut $1 trillion from the federal budget before the 2026 midter...

items.title: Steve Davis was Elon Musk’s chief cost-cutter at X and the Boring Company. DOGE might be his next big project
items.description: Former coworkers describe Davis's ruthless focus on efficiency, which could be perfect for cutting government bloat.
